SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , T1.MMT_ID AS MMT_ID , T1.MMT_NM AS MMT_NM , T1.MMT_DTM AS MMT_DTM , T1.USR_ID AS MMT_USR_ID , T1.USR_NM AS MMT_USR_NM , T1.USR_IMG_ID AS MMT_USR_IMG_ID , T1.MMT_MEM_CNT AS MMT_MEM_CNT , Y.SPR_NM AS SPR_NM FROM ( SELECT A.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , A.MMT_ID AS MMT_ID , A.MMT_NM AS MMT_NM , A.MMT_DESC AS MMT_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.MMT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MMT_DTM , A.USR_ID AS USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '6') AS USR_IMG_ID , MMT_MEM_CNT AS MMT_MEM_CNT FROM SPR2000 A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.MMT_ID AS MMT_ID , COUNT( B.MMT_ID ) AS MMT_MEM_CNT FROM SPR2001 B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.SPR_ID = #sprId# GROUP BY B.MMT_ID ) C ON ( A.MMT_ID = C.MMT_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# ORDER BY A.MMT_ID DESC ) T1 LEFT JOIN SPR1000 Y ON T1.SPR_ID = Y.SPR_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.MMT_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.MMT_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(T1.MMT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(T1.MMT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND EXISTS ( SELECT Y.MMT_ID FROM SPR2001 Y WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND Y.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Y.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND Y.MMT_ID = T1.MMT_ID AND SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(Y.USR_ID, '1') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT Y.MMT_ID FROM SPR2001 Y WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND Y.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Y.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND Y.MMT_ID = T1.MMT_ID AND SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(Y.USR_ID, '1') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT Y.MMT_ID FROM SPR2001 Y WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Y.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND Y.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Y.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND Y.MMT_ID = T1.MMT_ID AND SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(Y.USR_ID, '2') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%' )
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY RN DESC

SELECT A.SPR_ID AS SPR_ID , B.SPR_NM AS SPR_NM , A.MMT_ID AS MMT_ID , A.MMT_NM AS MMT_NM , A.MMT_DESC AS MMT_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.MMT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MMT_DTM , A.USR_ID AS USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '6') AS USR_IMG_ID FROM SPR2000 A LEFT JOIN SPR1000 B ON A.SPR_ID = B.SPR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.MMT_ID = #mmtId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_MMT_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_MMT_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'MMT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_MMT_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(MMT_ID) AS NEW_MMT_ID FROM SPR2000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.MMT_ID LIKE 'MMT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO SPR2000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID ,SPR_ID, MMT_ID, MMT_NM ,MMT_DESC, MMT_DTM, USR_ID ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjGrpId#, #prjId# ,#sprId#, #newMmtId#, #mmtNm# ,#mmtDesc#, SYSDATE, #mmtUsrId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SPR2000 A SET MMT_NM = #mmtNm# ,MMT_DESC = #mmtDesc# ,MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE ,MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.MMT_ID = #mmtId#
